text: Kto ishchet slavy i velichiya sebe, To u Allakha - vse velichiye i slava; K Nemu i slovo dobroye voskhodit, I dobroye deyaniye (speshit), Kotoroye On (milost'yu Svoyeyu) vozvyshayet. A tem, kotoryye zamyslili nedobryye dela, (Naznachena) muchitel'naya kara, I obratyatsya v tshchEtu ikh ulovki
